# AVPlayerItemIntegratedTimelineSnapshot

**Class**

An immutable representation of inspectable details of an integrated timeline object.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVPlayerItemIntegratedTimelineSnapshot
```

## Overview

A snapshot doesn’t reflect the new timeline state as playback progresses. You can request a new snapshot instance from an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItemIntegratedTimeline] that reflect the latest timeline state.

## Inspecting the snapshot

- **duration**: The total duration of the primary item and scheduled interstitial events.
- **currentSegment**: The currently playing segment.
- **segments**: The segments for this snapshot.
- **AVPlayerItemSegment**: An immutable object that represents a segment of time on the integrated timeline.
- **currentTime**: The current time on the integrated timeline when the system created the snapshot.
- **currentDate**: The current date on the integrated timeline when the system created the snapshot.

## Time mapping

- **segmentAndOffsetIntoSegment(forTimelineTime:)**

## Inspecting snapshots

- **currentSnapshot**: An immutable representation of the timeline state at time of request.
- **snapshotsOutOfSyncNotification**: A notification the system posts when the snapshot objects provided by this timeline become out of sync with the current timeline state.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
